tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transactions ( 
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  user_id INT NOT NULL, 
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
  location VARCHAR(100), 
  is_fraudulent BOOLEAN NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_time TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    is_fraudulent BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    registration_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE fraud_detection_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id UUID NOT NULL,
    detection_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    detection_algorithm VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    fraud_probability DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    is_fraudulent BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    registration_date TIMESTAMP,
    is_verified BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_date TIMESTAMP,
    is_resolved BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE anomaly_scores (
    score_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    anomaly_score FLOAT,
    score_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE transaction_data (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    is_fraudulent BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE user_profile (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE anomaly_detection_results (
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    anomaly_score FLOAT,
    detected_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE fraud_alerts (
    alert_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    alert_message TEXT,
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE anomaly_by_user (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    total_anomalies INT,
    last_anomaly_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
